typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	TRM as double (1.00)
}
source(output(
		Escenario as string,
		CuentaAuxiliar as string,
		CuentaObjeto as string,
		Anio as string,
		Mes as string,
		Libro as string,
		CentroResponsabilidad as string,
		CodigoEmpresa as string,
		CodigoCompania as string,
		ValorOrigen as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> Mongo
Mongo alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateField
UpdateField derive(ValorOrigenSensibilidad = ValorOrigen/$TRM) ~> TRM
TRM sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Escenario as string,
		CuentaAuxiliar as string,
		CuentaObjeto as string,
		Anio as string,
		Mes as string,
		Libro as string,
		CentroResponsabilidad as string,
		CodigoEmpresa as string,
		CodigoCompania as string,
		ValorOrigen as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MontoTO
